hero.description_support_center: Find answers about our process, services, and support. If you can't find what you're looking for, our team is ready to chat.

process.title: Our Work Process
process.description: Each project goes through clear stages of planning, design, development, and testing, ensuring high-quality deliveries on time.

solutions.title: Custom Solutions
solutions.description: We specialize in creating custom software, websites, and applications that solve real problems and boost your business.

support.title: Post-Launch Support
support.description: We offer a warranty and ongoing maintenance plans to ensure your digital solution remains secure, updated, and functional.

partnership.title: Partnership and Transparency
partnership.description: We work alongside you. Communication is constant and every proposal is detailed, so you have full confidence in the project.

software.question: What kind of software do you develop?
software.answer: We specialize in custom software tailored to your business needs, including management systems (ERP, CRM), process automation, and SaaS platforms, always focused on optimizing your operations.

sites.question: Do you create any type of website?
sites.answer: Yes. We develop everything from landing pages and institutional websites to complex portals and robust e-commerce stores. All our sites are responsive (mobile-friendly) and optimized for Google (SEO).

apps.question: For which operating systems do you develop apps?
apps.answer: We develop for the main systems: iOS (Apple) and Android (Google). We create native apps for maximum performance or cross-platform apps to optimize costs and development time.

cost.question: How much does a project cost and how long does it take?
cost.answer: The cost and timeline depend on the complexity and scope of each project. After an initial conversation to understand your needs, we prepare a detailed and transparent proposal with the schedule and investment.

support.question: Do you offer support after the project is delivered?
support.answer: Absolutely. Our partnership doesn't end at launch. All projects include a warranty period, and we offer ongoing support and maintenance plans to ensure the longevity of your platform.

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.description: Find quick answers to your most common questions about our services and processes.

specialty.question: What is ayrCore's specialty?
specialty.answer: Our specialty is custom software development, from mobile applications to complex corporate systems. We work with modern technologies and agile methodologies to create solutions that truly solve each client's specific problems.

process.question: How does the development process work?
process.answer: Our process is collaborative and transparent, divided into 4 main phases: 1) Discovery and Planning, 2) Design and Prototyping, 3) Development and Testing, 4) Launch and Support. You follow each step and actively participate in decisions.

cost.question: How much does it cost to develop software or an app?
cost.answer: The cost of a project varies significantly depending on complexity, desired features, and technologies used. After an initial conversation to understand your needs, we prepare a detailed and transparent proposal with costs and timelines.

tracking.question: Can I track the progress of my project?
tracking.answer: Yes! Transparency is one of our fundamental values. You'll have access to a platform where you can track progress in real-time, see completed tasks, and participate in regular status meetings with our team.

support.question: Do you offer maintenance and support after launch?
support.answer: Absolutely. We offer ongoing support and maintenance plans to ensure your solution remains secure, updated, and working perfectly. All projects include an initial warranty period.

technologies.question: What technologies do you use?
technologies.answer: We work with all modern market technologies: React, Node.js, Python, Flutter, React Native, AWS, Docker, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and many others. We choose the ideal stack for each project based on specific requirements.

cta.title: Still have questions?
cta.description: Our team is ready to discuss the specifics of your project.
